name: Graydle Something from the Dark Side
text: You can banish 1 "Graydle" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Graydle Token" (Aqua-Type/WATER/ATK 0/Def 0) with the same Level as the banished monster. It cannot be used as Link Material. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect except "Graydle" monsters.
